simIDM Package

Source: R/package.R
simIDM-package.Rd

simIDM simulates a survival multistate model that jointly models PFS and OS.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/insightsengineering/simIDM/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/insightsengineering/simIDM/issues
